weekly_top_story.headline: White House Announces Discounted IVF Drug Partnership Ahead of TrumpRx Launch
weekly_top_story.summary: The White House secured an agreement with EMD Serono to sell three common IVF drugs at over 70% reduced prices starting January 2026, aiming to lower fertility treatment costs and encourage expanded employer IVF coverage.

stories.headline: State Medicaid Programs Implement Major Changes Amid Rising Costs
stories.summary: Several states, including California launching a low-cost insulin program and Michigan tightening Medicaid weight-loss drug coverage, are adjusting Medicaid policies to manage escalating healthcare costs.

stories.headline: Federal Government Shutdown Hits Healthcare Programs and Marketplace Enrollment
stories.summary: With the ongoing federal shutdown nearing one month, critical programs like SNAP face funding cuts, and marketplace health insurance premium increases loom as open enrollment begins November 1.
